# RagsPro API Gateway
> Enterprise-grade API key management and AI proxy platform

## About
RagsPro API Gateway (https://api.ragspro.com) is an enterprise-grade platform for API key management and AI inference. Built by Bhupender Pratap and Raghav Shah at RagsPro (https://ragspro.com), a software development agency based in India.

## What It Does
- **API Key Management**: Create, rotate, revoke, and validate API keys with AES-256 encryption
- **AI Proxy**: OpenAI-compatible endpoints for chat completions, image generation, and model listing
- **Analytics**: Real-time usage tracking per key — total calls, response times, provider breakdown
- **Security**: Role-based access control (Admin, User, Viewer), JWT authentication, IP whitelisting
- **Multi-Provider**: Support for NVIDIA, OpenAI, and custom AI providers

## API Endpoints
- `POST /api/v1/auth/register` — Create an account
- `POST /api/v1/auth/login` — Login and get JWT token
- `POST /api/v1/keys` — Create a new API key
- `GET /api/v1/keys` — List your API keys
- `POST /api/v1/validate` — Validate an API key (sub-10ms)
- `GET /v1/models` — List available AI models
- `POST /v1/chat/completions` — Chat with AI (OpenAI-compatible, streaming supported)
- `POST /v1/images/generations` — Generate images

## Pricing
- **Free**: Up to 10 API keys, AES-256 encryption, basic analytics, 60 req/min
- **Pro (₹899/mo)**: Unlimited keys, advanced analytics, 1000 req/min, custom providers, team management

## Quick Start
1. Sign up at https://api.ragspro.com/login
2. Create an API key from the dashboard
3. Use the key to call AI endpoints or validate in your app

## Example Usage
```bash
# Chat with AI using your RagsPro API key
curl -X POST https://api-key-backend-xsdo.onrender.com/v1/chat/completions \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer akm_your_key_here" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -d '{"model":"meta/llama-3.1-8b-instruct","messages":[{"role":"user","content":"Hello!"}]}'
```

## Tech Stack
- Backend: Python, FastAPI, SQLAlchemy, PostgreSQL
- Frontend: React, TypeScript, Vite
- Hosting: Render (backend), Vercel (frontend)
- Security: AES-256 (Fernet), JWT, bcrypt
